config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'guiAdvancedOptions' is loaded from the preference store and used to set various GUI elements in the application based on the values stored in the configuration.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the 'loadPrefs' method is called, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user accesses the settings/preferences section.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'guiAdvancedOptions' configuration option is significant as it determines whether the application should display advanced or simple options to the user. This can affect the complexity and usability of the application interface based on the user's preference.
